issue.title: BDI single-step fails when orientation not close to zero

content.raw:
Duplicated from #325

We don't have time to test the issue 311 pull by building from source, but would be willing if the updates are in drcsim-nightly.

The last I heard, you were punting on the merge request.. We would like to have working step control if possible.
